At the airort

  • 2 hours before scheduled departure time at French airports and other short haul airports in Europe, Middle East and North Africa;

  • 3 hours before scheduled departure time in case of flights from USA, Canada, China and other long haul destinations;

  • 23 hours before scheduled departure time for flights departing from Warsaw to any LOT Polish Airlines destination,as well as from the below mentioned airports: Stockholm (ARN), Copenhagen (CPH), Dusseldorf (DUS), Munich (MUC), Frankfurt (FRA), Geneva (GVA).

Web Check-in

Web check-In, the Budgetflights online check-in facility opens 36 hours prior to the scheduled departure and closes 120 minutes before take-off.

To check-in online with our Web Check-In service, you will need:

  • your reservation or ticket number

  • the passenger's surname
